attributes.attribute:
<config> <list name="SortByStory"> <value name="creation_stamp DESC" display="Latest loaded first" /> <value name="creation_stamp ASC" display="Oldest loaded first" /> <value name="update_stamp DESC" display="Latest modified first" /> <value name="update_stamp ASC" display="Oldest modified first" /> <value name="filename DESC" display="Filename descending" /> <value name="filename ASC" display="Filename ascending" /> <value name="story_element_headline DESC" display="Headline descending" /> <value name="story_element_headline ASC" display="Headline ascending" /> </list>
<list name="SortByPage"> <value name="publication_date DESC, publication_page_number ASC, publication_title ASC, publication_edition ASC" display="Latest published first" /> <value name="publication_date ASC, publication_page_number ASC, publication_title ASC, publication_edition ASC" display="Earliest published first" /> <value name="publication_page_number ASC, publication_date DESC, publication_title ASC, publication_edition ASC" display="Page smallest to largest" /> <value name="creation_stamp DESC" display="Latest loaded first" /> <value name="creation_stamp ASC" display="Oldest loaded first" /> <value name="update_stamp DESC" display="Latest modified first" /> <value name="update_stamp ASC" display="Oldest modified first" /> <value name="publication_edition DESC" display="Publication Edition descending" /> <value name="publication_edition ASC" display="Publication Edition ascending" /> <value name="publication_page_number DESC" display="Page (number only) largest to smallest" /> <value name="publication_page_number ASC" display="Page (number only) smallest to largest" /> </list>
<list name="SortByUsage"> <value optgroup="Asset" name="creation_stamp DESC" display="Latest loaded first" /> <value optgroup="Asset" name="creation_stamp ASC" display="Oldest loaded first" /> <value optgroup="Asset" name="update_stamp DESC" display="Latest modified first" /> <value optgroup="Asset" name="update_stamp ASC" display="Oldest modified first" /> <value optgroup="Print publications" name="u_publication_date DESC" display="Latest published first" /> <value optgroup="Print publications" name="u_publication_date ASC" display="Earlest published first" /> <value optgroup="Print publications" name="u_publication_page_number DESC" display="Page largest to smallest" /> <value optgroup="Print publications" name="u_publication_page_number ASC" display="Page smallest to largest" /> <value optgroup="Web/Syndication publications" name="u_published_start_date DESC" display="Latest sent/published on first" /> <value optgroup="Web/Syndication publications" name="u_published_start_date ASC" display="Earlest sent/published on first" /> </list> </config>
Overriding colour scheme for CHPSysMgt to be different to CHP

{ "copyright_icon":"far fa-copyright tmg_copyright_icon_colour", "fee-warning":"LOOKUP__NOTICE_FEE", "correction_icon":"fas fa-check-double tmg_correction_icon_colour", "production_note":"LOOKUP__NOTICE_PRODUCTION_NOTE", "legal_icon":"fas fa-balance-scale tmg_legal_icon_colour", "LowQuality":"fas fa-thumbs-down", "CP":"fas fa-file-download", "DTI": "fas fa-share-square", "CopyAssetID": "fas fa-clipboard" }
